name: exaltedly
content:
exaltedly adverb
(HAPPILY)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in an extremely happy way: She was exaltedly telling all her friends about her work. The protestors marched along with their banners waving exaltedly in the breeze.
More examplesFewer examplesThey watched exaltedly as the soldiers took the oath.He laughed exaltedly and ignored what she was saying.
